title: Claims notifications to reinsurers (large loss notices)
dataVerified: Ceding company, reinsurer, claim details, estimated ultimate loss, treaty reference
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents late claims notifications (treaty violations). Domain binding verifies ceding company. Time-sensitive reporting requirements (30-90 days typical). Multi-million dollar claim notifications. Reinsurer recovery verification.
